verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Here I am to bow down,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Here I am to say that you're my God

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Light of the world
You stepped down Into darkness
Opened my eyes

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Let me see
Beauty that made this heart adore you
Hope of life spent with you

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
King of all days
Also highly exalted

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Glorious in heaven above
Humbly you came to the earth
You created all for loves sake became poor
